Articles.Content: Hello! I'm relativity new to this game, landing my first Mun lander a while ago. Looking forward to the excitements of this game to come!

Hiya Tommyrocket, welcome to the community

Have fun in KSP, there are much harder challenges awaiting with the new planets, good luck reaching them

Welcome to the forums Tommyrocket.

Landing on the Mun is a great achievement so head on out there to Minmus and then attempt the other planets and their moons.

You can also check some of the cool sections on this forum like General Discussion, Challenges and Add-Ons. There's lots to do here.

Good luck and go blow up some rockets.
